name: Way Animation Tweet
author: Way Web Solution

sections.description:
This is a easy plugin can easyliy configure and embed with your site. including all details and documents.
How can use and configure detailded document is given at following link : http://waywebsolution.com/plugins/lazytweet/animdoc/documentation/

WAY Animation Tweets plugin for WordPress allows you to easily show tweets in real time from three most popular twitter resources. Tweets can be shown using the included shortcode generator in posts and pages, using the widget or directly in theme using php function. The template used is highly customisable you can change the tweet layout, link colors or create your own custom template.

Features————– Multiple Tweet Instances Multiple Browser Support Responsive design Beautiful Animation Effects Fully customizable Show tweets via Shortcodes and Widget Number of tweets to show Three popular twitter resources List Tweets User Tweets Search Tweets Follow Link on image Human Readable Tweet Time Live Tweets as they happen Linkified Hashtags and Mentions Tweets from City, Country or Location Reply, Favorite and Retweet links Favorite and Retweet Counters Support Custom Template API Limit Monitor Developer Friendly

short_description: Way animation tweet allow you to Load Live tweet from twitter account with animation and Ajax loading
